languages.text:
Area attacks with this maul create a smoke cloud. All creatures that enter that area must pass Toughness, Strength, and Willpower resistance tests with a −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

All creatures that enter that area must pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.</indent>

languages.original_text:
Атаки этой булавой {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} создают облако дыма. Входя в эту область, все существа выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb}.
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Выносливости существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Силы — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Воли — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>

languages.text:
Bu tokmakla yapılan {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g}, bir duman bulutu oluşturur. Bu alana giren tüm yaratıklar, −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} ceza puanına sahip {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testlerinden{/g} geçmelidir.
-<indent=5%>Hedef, Dayanıklılık {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testini{/g} geçemezse 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşir{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hedef, Kuvvet testini geçemezse 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hedef, İrade testini geçemezse 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygılanır{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Bu tokmakla yapılan alan saldırıları, bir duman bulutu oluşturur. Bu alana giren tüm yaratıklar, −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} ceza puanına sahip Dayanıklılık, Kuvvet ve İrade direnç testlerinden geçmelidir.
-<indent=5%>Hedef, Dayanıklılık testini geçemezse 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşir{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hedef, Kuvvet testini geçemezse 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}.</indent>

Bu alana giren tüm yaratıklar, −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} ceza puanına sahip {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testlerinden{/g} geçmelidir.
-<indent=5%>Hedef, Dayanıklılık testini geçemezse 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşir{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hedef, Kuvvet testini geçemezse 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hedef, İrade testini geçemezse 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygılanır{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} efectuados con esta maza crean una nube de humo. Todas las criaturas que entren en esta zona deben superar {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb}.
-<indent=5%>Fallar la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Resistencia hace que el objetivo quede {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si falla la prueba de Fuerza, queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si falla la prueba de Voluntad, queda {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Fallar la prueba de Resistencia hace que el objetivo quede {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si falla la prueba de Fuerza, queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si falla la prueba de Voluntad, queda {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>

Los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} efectuados con esta maza crean una nube de humo. Todas las criaturas que entren en esta zona deben superar {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb}.
-<indent=5%>Fallar la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Resistencia hace que el objetivo quede {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si falla la prueba de Fuerza, queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si falla la prueba de Voluntad, queda {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>

languages.text:
使用这把大锤进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，会产生一片烟雾。所有进入烟雾区域内的生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在三次检定中承受-{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb}减值。
-<indent=5%> 未能通过坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>
-<indent=5%> 未能通过力量检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
-<indent=5%> 未能通过意志检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with this maul create a smoke cloud. All creatures that enter that area must pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
使用这把大锤进行范围攻击时，会产生一片烟雾。所有进入烟雾区域内的生物都需要进行坚韧、力量、意志抗性检定，且在三次检定中承受-{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}减值。
-<indent=5%> 未能通过坚韧检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
-<indent=5%> 未能通过力量检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
-<indent=5%> 未能通过意志检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} effectuées avec cette masse produisent un nuage de fumée. Les créatures qui pénètrent dans la zone doivent réussir des {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb}.
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'Endurance, la cible est {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglée{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec d'un test de Force, elle est {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentie{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec d'un test de Force mentale, elle est {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbée{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with this maul create a smoke cloud. All creatures that enter that area must pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Les attaques de zone effectuées avec cette masse produisent un nuage de fumée. Les créatures qui pénètrent dans la zone doivent réussir des tests de résistance d'Endurance, de Force et de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}.
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec d'un test d'Endurance, la cible est {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglée{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec d'un test de Force, elle est {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentie{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec d'un test de Force mentale, elle est {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbée{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>

languages.text:
このモールによる{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}で煙の雲が発生する。そのエリアに入るすべての生物は、-{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。
‐<indent=5%>耐久力抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}で失敗すると、ターゲットは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。</indent>
‐<indent=5%>腕力判定で失敗すると、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になる。</indent>
‐<indent=5%>意志力抵抗判定で失敗すると、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}になる。</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with this maul create a smoke cloud. All creatures that enter that area must pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
このモールによる範囲攻撃で煙の雲が発生する。そのエリアに入るすべての生物は、-{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}のペナルティで耐久力、腕力、意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならない。
‐<indent=5%>耐久力抵抗判定で失敗すると、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。</indent>
‐<indent=5%>腕力判定で失敗すると、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になる。</indent>
‐<indent=5%>意志力抵抗判定で失敗すると、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}になる。</indent>

このモールによる範囲攻撃で煙の雲が発生する。そのエリアに入るすべての生物は、-{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb}のペナルティで耐久力、腕力、意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならない。
‐<indent=5%>耐久力抵抗判定で失敗すると、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。</indent>
‐<indent=5%>腕力判定で失敗すると、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になる。</indent>
‐<indent=5%>意志力抵抗判定で失敗すると、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}になる。</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} mit diesem Hammer erzeugen eine Rauchwolke. Alle Kreaturen, die den Bereich betreten, müssen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} bestehen.
-<indent=5%>Misslingt die Zähigkeit-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g}, wird das Ziel 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Misslingt die Stärke-Probe, wird das Ziel 2 Runden lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Misslingt die Willenskraft-Probe, ist das Ziel 2 Runden lang {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}verstört{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with this maul create a smoke cloud. All creatures that enter that area must pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:

-<indent=5%>Misslingt die Willenskraft-Probe, ist das Ziel 2 Runden lang {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}verstört{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Атаки этой булавой {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} создают облако дыма. Входя в эту область, все существа выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb}.

-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Силы — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Воли — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>
